statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_location = 'New York';
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_gender, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_location FROM patients ORDER BY patient_gender ASC, patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_gender, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_gender;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;

SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND patients.patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(appointment_id) > 1 ORDER BY appointment_count DESC;
SELECT id, name, specialty FROM doctor;
SELECT id, age, gender FROM patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, specialty, clinic_location FROM doctor WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT id, appointment_date, status FROM appointment ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, contact_number FROM patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM doctor WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointment WHERE status = 'confirmed' AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT doctor.name, patient.name, appointment.appointment_date FROM doctor JOIN appointment ON doctor.id = appointment.doctor_id JOIN patient ON patient.id = appointment.patient_id WHERE doctor.specialty = 'Pediatrics' AND patient.age <= 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM appointment WHERE status = 'confirmed' GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING total_appointments > 5 ORDER BY total_appointments DESC;

SELECT doctor.name AS doctor_name, patient.name AS patient_name, appointment.appointment_date AS appt_date FROM doctor JOIN appointment ON doctor.id = appointment.doctor_id JOIN patient ON patient.id = appointment.patient_id WHERE doctor.name LIKE '%Smith%' AND patient.gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_age ASC
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_age DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2023-10-15'
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_location FROM Doctors;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, doctor_specialty, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Doctors JOIN MedicalRecords ON Doctors.doctor_id = MedicalRecords.doctor_id JOIN Patients ON MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM doctors WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment, follow_up_date FROM medical_history WHERE follow_up_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY follow_up_date;
SELECT hospital_name, location, contact_number FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California';
